entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times late this morning and this afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
